thread.title: Ground News - Breaking the cycle: A surgeon’s fight against genetic heart disease
thread.title_full: Ground News - Breaking the cycle: A surgeon’s fight against genetic heart disease

author: The Atlanta Voice
title: Ground News - Breaking the cycle: A surgeon’s fight against genetic heart disease
text: William Cooper calls Atlanta home, a city located a two-hour flight away from Kansas City, where he contracts as a heart surgeon. Cooper, a proud Kansas City Chiefs fan, displayed the team’s logo on his jacket during our Zoom interview, just a week after the Chiefs’ Super Bowl win. Super Bowl Sunday, a day filled with excitement, included an unexpected visit to the emergency room for Cooper after he experienced chest pain.
